recap.summaryText: With 4 years of software experience and over 2 years of professional work experience, I am a full-stack developer. I have professional-level expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript. Currently, I am developing my experiences using Next and Node.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.text: As a full-stack developer, I've successfully developed over 10 projects. I have experience in many different fields. Here are some of my experiences.
experiences.landingWebPage: Unique websites for different companies. In these experiences, I have try to make interestring and user-friendly designs.
experiences.webpToApplication: That takes users from a web page to a mobile application. After registering, users can log in to the application and start using the service.
experiences.ecommerceText: E-commerce webapplication for a global company that sells products to the USA, UK, Germany, France, Italy, Spain, and other countries.
experiences.servicesText: I provide professional services on these fields. Further details you can look my services.

contact.title: Do you like what you've seen so far?
contact.text: I'm always excited to connect! Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate, or just want to chat about tech, feel free to reach out. Let's explore how we can create something amazing together.

recap.summary:
As a graduate of the Computer Engineering program at Ted University, I have focused my career on software development. During my education, I completed two long-term internships; the first was at Altima, and the second was at Osi. Following my internships, I worked at Osi as a full-stack developer for over 2 years, contributing to significant experiences during that time.

Currently, I am working at Oak Technology as a front-end developer, where I leverage modern technologies to develop user-focused solutions.
recap.description2:
Throughout my career in software development, I have taken on significant responsibilities in front-end, back-end, and SEO. With the experience gained from these projects, I have developed user-friendly websites and high-performance applications. I closely follow modern software technologies and implement the latest and best solutions in all my projects.

My goal is to create high-quality and sustainable projects that best meet my clients' needs. I continue to grow and learn with each new project.
recap.servicesText: I give professional services on front-end, back-end, SEO and more. You can look my services.

ContactPage.title: Get in Touch
ContactPage.description: Feel free to reach out! Whether you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, I'm here to help. Send me a message, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

validation.name: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.subject: Subject must be at least 3 characters
validation.message: Message must be at least 10 characters

Blog.title: Blog
Blog.description: Welcome to my blog! Here, I share my thoughts, experiences, and learnings about web development and technology. Whether you're a fellow developer or just curious about what I'm up to, you're in the right place.
Blog.invalidUrl: Invalid page or posts per page value. Redirecting to valid page.
Blog.invalidUrlFormat: Page and posts per page must be numbers. Redirecting to first page.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: I offer comprehensive web development solutions including front-end design, back-end development, and SEO optimization. With extensive experience across modern technologies, I can help bring your digital vision to life. Explore my tech stack below to see the tools and frameworks I use to create powerful, efficient solutions.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.description: As a full-stack developer, I use a lot of libraries, tools etc. Here are the ones I use most.
techStack.visitContact: Are you ready to start your project? Let's talk about it.
